channel.title: Hugo on NOTES
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on NOTES

item.title: Host Hugo Sites On GITHUB
item.description: Hugo is free, static, fast and minimal website creator. In this blog we are going to setup this current Hugo site (without modification) and deploy to Github Pages for free. I am also going to setup so new posts can be added and published on your website everytime. Login Github Install Hugo On System Create Two Repos on Github a. blog Houses our hugo code b. username.github.io For website generated pages Get Theme for Hugo (PaperMod) Clone ‘blog ’ Repo in Desktop (notesite) git clone https://github.
